trans-unit.source: A component that accepts channels and associates them with a service.
trans-unit.target: Um componente que aceita os canais e as associa com um serviço.

trans-unit.source: A ChannelDispatcher object associates an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> at a particular URI (called a listen URI) with an instance of a service.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ChannelDispatcher associa um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>em um URI específico (chamado de um URI de escuta) com uma instância de um serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object can have many ChannelDispatcher objects, each associated with a different listener and listen URI for that service.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objeto pode ter muitos objetos ChannelDispatcher, cada um associado a um ouvinte diferente e URI de escuta para esse serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When a message arrives, the ChannelDispatcher queries each of the associated <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> objects whether the endpoint can accept the message, and passes the message to the one that can.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma mensagem chega, o ChannelDispatcher consulta cada um associado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>objetos se o ponto de extremidade pode aceitar a mensagem e passa a mensagem para aquele que conseguir.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> object is responsible for processing messages from a ChannelDispatcher when the destination address of a message matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.AddressFilter%2A> property and the message action matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.ContractFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>objeto é responsável pelo processamento de mensagens de um ChannelDispatcher quando o endereço de destino de uma mensagem corresponde a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.AddressFilter%2A>propriedade e as correspondências de ação de mensagem de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.ContractFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.ContractFilter%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher.AddressFilter%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: All properties that control the lifetime and behavior of a channel session are available for inspection or modification on the ChannelDispatcher object.
trans-unit.target: Todas as propriedades que controlam o comportamento de uma sessão de canal e tempo de vida estão disponíveis para a inspeção ou modificação no objeto ChannelDispatcher.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>, these include custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer> objects, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>, the associated and <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.
trans-unit.target: Além de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>, eles incluem personalizado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer>objetos, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> e associados</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> class from the provided listener, with system-provided default timeouts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>classe do ouvinte fornecido, com limites padrão fornecido pelo sistema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> for the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> para o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: listener is .
trans-unit.target: listeneris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> class from the provided listener and binding, with system-provided default timeouts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>classe do ouvinte fornecido e associação, com limites padrão fornecido pelo sistema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> for the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> para o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome da associação usada para configurar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: listener is .
trans-unit.target: listeneris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> class from the provided listener and binding, with the specified default timeouts.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>classe do ouvinte fornecido e associação com os limites padrão especificado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome da associação usada para configurar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts>para o serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts>

trans-unit.source: listener is .
trans-unit.target: listeneris .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transacted accept method calls on listener are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o transacionado aceita as chamadas de método no ouvinte são assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transacted accept method calls on listener are asynchronous; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se aceitar o transacionado chamadas de método no ouvinte são assíncronas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the channel dispatcher to the host.
trans-unit.target: Anexa o dispatcher do canal para o host.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"> </xref> para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the binding used to configure the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da associação usada para configurar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: Used to obtain the binding name for the binding with which this channel dispatcher is associated.
trans-unit.target: Usado para obter o nome da associação para a associação ao qual esse distribuidor de canal está associado.

trans-unit.source: The binding name of the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome da associação do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"></xref> objects that you can use to inspect and add state to channels when they are first created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"> </xref> objetos que você pode usar para inspecionar e adicionar o estado para canais quando eles são criados pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to insert a custom channel initializer into the initialization collection to inspect or modify channel state when they are created.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para inserir um inicializador de canal personalizado para a coleção de inicialização para inspecionar ou modificar o estado do canal quando eles são criados.

trans-unit.source: This is also useful to perform the same behavior on outgoing channels if the contract associated with a dispatcher is a duplex contract.
trans-unit.target: Isso também é útil para executar o mesmo comportamento em canais de saída, se o contrato associado com um distribuidor é um contrato duplex.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> do tipo <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IChannelInitializer"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Stops the listener from accepting new channels.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o ouvinte de aceitar novos canais.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method stops the listener listening.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método interrompe o ouvinte escuta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to close.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o intervalo de tempo permitido para o distribuidor de canal fechar.

trans-unit.source: This default close timeout can be set using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.
trans-unit.target: Tempo limite de fechamento esse padrão pode ser definido usando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a service model default value of 1 minute is used.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, é usado um valor de padrão de modelo de serviço de 1 minuto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to close.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo de tempo permitido para o distribuidor de canal fechar.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to open.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o intervalo de tempo permitido para o distribuidor de canal abrir.

trans-unit.source: This default open timeout can be set using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.
trans-unit.target: Esse limite de abrir do padrão pode ser definido usando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.IDefaultCommunicationTimeouts%29>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a service model default value of 1 minute is used.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, é usado um valor de padrão de modelo de serviço de 1 minuto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the default interval of time allowed for the channel dispatcher to close.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo de tempo permitido para o distribuidor de canal fechar.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Detaches the service host from the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Desanexa o host de serviço do distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> can only be detached when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>só pode ser desanexado quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> associated with the channel dispatcher to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>associado com o distribuidor de canal para `null`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"> </xref> para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: host is .
trans-unit.target: hostis .

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the endpoint dispatchers which forward messages to the channel endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os distribuidores de ponto de extremidade que encaminham mensagens para os pontos de extremidade de canal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> has a distinct <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> for each endpoint that the channel can support.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>tem um distintos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>para cada ponto de extremidade de canal pode dar suporte.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> to obtain access to runtime properties that enable you to customize the runtime across an entire endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>para obter acesso a propriedades de tempo de execução que permitem personalizar o tempo de execução em um ponto de extremidade inteiro.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> which forward messages to the channel endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>que encaminhar mensagens para os pontos de extremidade de canal.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"></xref> objects that can be used to insert custom error handling functionality for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"> </xref> objetos que podem ser usados para inserir a funcionalidade para um ponto de extremidade de tratamento de erros personalizados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.SynchronizedCollection%601> de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IErrorHandler"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the host for the service associated with the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o host para o serviço associado com o distribuidor.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> object can have many <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> objects, each associated with a different <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> for that service.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>objeto pode ter muitos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>objetos, cada um associado com outro <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>para esse serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"></xref> for the service associated with the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase"> </xref> para o serviço associado com o distribuidor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the details about an exception in a fault.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve incluir os detalhes sobre uma exceção em uma falha.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the details about an exception are included in the faults; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os detalhes sobre a exceção são incluídos em falhas. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the accept method calls on the listener are done under a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as chamadas de método aceitar no ouvinte terminar em uma transação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the accept method calls on the listener are done under a transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se chama o método de aceitação no ouvinte é feita em uma transação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the receive method calls on the listener are done under a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as chamadas de método receive no ouvinte terminar em uma transação.

trans-unit.source: The IsTransactedReceive property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: A IsTransactedReceive propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the receive method calls on the listener are done under a transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se chama o método receive no ouvinte é feita em uma transação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the listener associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ouvinte associado com o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> associates an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> at a particular URI with an instance of a service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>associa um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>em um URI específico com uma instância de um serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"></xref> associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener"> </xref> associado com o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the channel dispatcher adds addressing headers to request-reply messages.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o distribuidor de canal adiciona cabeçalhos de endereçamento para mensagens de solicitação-resposta.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ManualAddressing%2A> property to `true` if you want to prevent the client from adding Message ID and ReplyTo addressing headers to request/response messages so that your application can control these headers.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ManualAddressing%2A>propriedade `true` se você quiser impedir que o cliente adicionar ID de mensagem e ReplyTo cabeçalhos de mensagens de solicitação/resposta de endereçamento para que seu aplicativo possa controlar esses cabeçalhos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ManualAddressing%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the proxy does not add any addressing headers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o proxy não adicionar nenhum cabeçalho de endereçamento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte comentários.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum pending messages per channel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o máximo de mensagens pendentes por canal.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing a maximum number of messages.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa um número máximo de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size for a transacted batch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho máximo para um lote transacionado.

trans-unit.source: The MaxTransactedBatchSize property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: A MaxTransactedBatchSize propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The maximum size for a transacted batch.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho máximo para um lote transacionado.

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor definido for menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SOAP message and WS-Addressing versions that are used or expected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a mensagem SOAP e WS-Addressing que são usados ou esperado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message and its exchange.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que as versões de SOAP e WS-Addressing associados a uma mensagem e sua troca.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> that is used or expected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>que é usado ou esperado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Aborts the listener associated with the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Anula o ouvinte associado com o distribuidor.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a channel listener for the dispatcher that must be completed within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para fechar um ouvinte de canal para o distribuidor que deve ser concluído dentro de um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica quanto tempo a operação de fechamento deve concluir antes do tempo limite.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the close operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegate que recebe a notificação da conclusão da operação de fechamento assíncrona.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pelo aplicativo, que contém informações de estado associadas com a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation to close a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que faz referência a operação assíncrona para fechar um ouvinte de canal para o distribuidor.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a channel listener for the dispatcher that must be completed within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para abrir um ouvinte de canal para o distribuidor que deve ser concluído dentro de um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher do canal deve ser associado uma não -`null` quando este método é chamado de host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long the open operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica quanto tempo a operação de abertura deve concluir antes do tempo limite.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the open operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>delegate que recebe a notificação de conclusão assíncrona da operação de abertura.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pelo aplicativo, que contém informações de estado associadas com a operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation to open a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que faz referência a operação assíncrona para abrir um ouvinte de canal para o distribuidor.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The host or the message version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O host ou a versão de mensagem é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the channel listener associated with the dispatcher within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Fecha a escuta de canal associada com o distribuidor em um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the interval of time allowed for the listener to close.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo de tempo permitido para o ouvinte fechar.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Provides a trace of the closing of the endpoint dispatchers associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um rastreamento do fechamento dos distribuidores de ponto de extremidade associado com o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to close a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Conclui uma operação assíncrona para fechar um ouvinte de canal para o distribuidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginClose*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>retornado por uma chamada para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginClose*>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginClose*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to open a channel listener for the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Conclui uma operação assíncrona para abrir um ouvinte de canal para o distribuidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginOpen*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IAsyncResult>retornado por uma chamada para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginOpen*>método.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.OnBeginOpen*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Opens the listener associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Abre o ouvinte associado com o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host when this method is called and message version must be set to a non-`null` value.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher do canal deve ser associado uma não -`null` host de serviço quando este método é chamado e a versão de mensagem deve ser definido como não`null` valor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies the interval of time allowed for the listener to open.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.TimeSpan>que especifica o intervalo de tempo permitido para o ouvinte abrir.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The host or the message version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O host ou a versão de mensagem é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates and validates filter table used to dispatch to the endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Preenche e valida a tabela de filtro usada para distribuir aos pontos de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher do canal deve ser associado uma não -`null` quando este método é chamado de host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The host is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O host está <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the channel dispatcher is attached to a host.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o distribuidor de canal está conectado a um host.

trans-unit.source: The channel dispatcher must be associated with a non-`null` service host on opening.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher do canal deve ser associado uma não -`null` host de serviço na abertura.

trans-unit.source: The host is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O host está <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether ReceiveContext is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se ReceiveContext está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: The ReceiveContext controls the manner in which messages are handled by the service, for example locking of the message as long as needed.
trans-unit.target: O ReceiveContext controla a maneira na qual as mensagens são tratadas pelo serviço, por exemplo o bloqueio da mensagem como necessário.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ReceiveContext is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se ReceiveContext está ativado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the dispatcher uses synchronous calls to read messages from channels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o distribuidor usa chamadas síncronas para ler mensagens de canais.

trans-unit.source: If a binding implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences>, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assigns the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property to this property.
trans-unit.target: Se uma associação implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences>, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] atribui o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>propriedade para essa propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences>

trans-unit.source: So if this value is `true`, the `false` default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> is overridden.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, se esse valor é `true`, o `false` valor de padrão <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>é substituído.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dispatcher uses synchronous methods to read messages from channels; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o distribuidor usa métodos síncronos para ler mensagens de canais; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether messages are sent asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se as mensagens são enviadas de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if messages are sent asynchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as mensagens são enviadas de forma assíncrona. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the service throttle for the service associated with the channel dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a limitação de serviço para o serviço associado com o distribuidor de canal.

trans-unit.source: This provides access to the controls used to optimize the availability and performance of a service.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso aos controles usados para otimizar a disponibilidade e o desempenho de um serviço.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default isolation level for transactions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nível de isolamento padrão para transações.

trans-unit.source: Use the TransactionIsolationLevel property to get or set the default isolation level for new transactions created by the dispatcher for the service.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade TransactionIsolationLevel para obter ou definir o nível de isolamento padrão para novas transações criadas pelo distribuidor para o serviço.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The isolation level set is not defined.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de nível de isolamento não está definido.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default timeout for new transactions created by the dispatcher on behalf of the service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o tempo limite padrão para novas transações criadas pelo dispatcher em nome do serviço.

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set when the instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> is in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade só pode ser definida quando a instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>state, pois esse é o único estado que é mutável e não descartado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that represents the default timeout period for transactions.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.TimeSpan>valor que representa o período de tempo limite padrão para transações.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than zero or is too large.
trans-unit.target: O valor definido for menor que zero ou é muito grande.

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>

trans-unit.source: The communication object is in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de comunicação está em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>estado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>
